data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: The competitor to be feared is one who never bothers about you at all, but goes on making his own business better all the time.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: It has been my observation that most people get ahead during the time that others waste.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: There are no big problems, there are just a lot of little problems.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Whether you believe you can do a thing or not, you are right.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Whether you think that you can, or that you can't, you are usually right.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: You will find men who want to be carried on the shoulders of others, who think that the world owes them a living. They don't seem to see that we must all lift together and pull together.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: There is one rule for the industrialist and that is: Make the best quality of goods possible at the lowest cost possible, paying the highest wages possible.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: We don't want tradition. We want to live in the present and the only history that is worth a tinker's dam is the history we make today.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Enthusiasm is the yeast that makes your hopes shine to the stars. Enthusiasm is the sparkle in your eyes, the swing in your gait. The grip of your hand, the irresistible surge of will and energy to execute your ideas.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: There is no man living that can not do more than he thinks he can.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Wealth, like happiness, is never attained when sought after directly. It comes as a by-product of providing a useful service.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Whatever you have, you must either use or lose.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: The highest use of capital is not to make more money, but to make money do more for the betterment of life.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Business is never so healthy as when, like a chicken, it must do a certain amount of scratching around for what it gets.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: It is well enough that people of the nation do not understand our banking and monetary system, for if they did, I believe there would be a revolution before tomorrow morning.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: I am looking for a lot of men who have an infinite capacity to not know what can't be done.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: An idealist is a person who helps other people to be prosperous.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: If money is your hope for independence you will never have it. The only real security that a man will have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience, and ability.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Speculation is only a word covering the making of money out of the manipulation of prices, instead of supplying goods and services.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: If you think you can do a thing or think you can't do a thing, you're right.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: History is more or less bunk.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: A market is never saturated with a good product, but it is very quickly saturated with a bad one.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Capital punishment is as fundamentally wrong as a cure for crime as charity is wrong as a cure for poverty.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: As we advance in life we learn the limits of our abilities.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience and ability.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: There is joy in work. There is no happiness except in the realization that we have accomplished something.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: You can't learn in school what the world is going to do next year.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: One of the greatest discoveries a man makes, one of his great surprises, is to find he can do what he was afraid he couldn't do.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason why so few engage in it.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: I cannot discover that anyone knows enough to say definitely what is and what is not possible.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Any colour - so long as it's black.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Most people spend more time and energy going around problems than in trying to solve them.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Time and money spent in helping men to do more for themselves is far better than mere giving.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: A bore is a person who opens his mouth and puts his feats in it.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: A business absolutely devoted to service will have only one worry about profits. They will be embarrassingly large.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Even a mistake may turn out to be the one thing necessary to a worthwhile achievement.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Don't find fault, find a remedy.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Life is a series of experiences, each one of which makes us bigger, even though sometimes it is hard to realize this. For the world was built to develop character, and we must learn that the setbacks and grieves which we endure help us in our marching onward.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Before everything else, getting ready is the secret of success.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: I believe God is managing affairs and that He doesn't need any advice from me. With God in charge, I believe everything will work out for the best in the end. So what is there to worry about.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Exercise is bunk. If you are healthy, you don't need it: if you are sick you should not take it.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: The man who will use his skill and constructive imagination to see how much he can give for a dollar, instead of how little he can give for a dollar, is bound to succeed.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Money is like an arm or leg - use it or lose it.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Competition is the keen cutting edge of business, always shaving away at costs.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: What's right about America is that although we have a mess of problems, we have great capacity - intellect and resources - to do some thing about them.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: If there is any one secret of success, it lies in the ability to get the other person's point of view and see things from that person's angle as well as from your own.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: I do not believe a man can ever leave his business. He ought to think of it by day and dream of it by night.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.en: It is not the employer who pays the wages. Employers only handle the money. It is the customer who pays the wages.
